id.description: Globally unique identifier for the Receiver

version.description: String formatted PTP timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating precisely when an attribute of the resource last changed

label.description: Freeform string label for the Receiver

format.description: Type of Flow accepted by the Receiver as a URN

tags.description: Key value set of freeform string tags to aid in filtering sources. Values should be represented as an array of strings. Can be empty.

device_id.description: Device ID which this Receiver forms part of

transport.description: Transport type accepted by the Receiver in URN format

subscription.description: Object containing the 'sender_id' currently subscribed to. Sender_id should be null on initialisation.

sender_id.description: UUID of the Sender that this Receiver is currently subscribed to
